title: How to recover deleted files from Android internal memory - Quora

response.answer_text: You can safely recover deleted files from internal memory of Android phone. This is because when files is removed from the internal storage, it didn’t delete permanently. But it is impossible to restore lost data from phone if data has become overwritten due to any reason. But you can try possible ways are given below to retrieve data as much as possible: 1. Recover Files from Backups: You can always take the precautions through backup data. This is first way to recover data loss on any phone because prevention is better than cure. It will prevent you from unexpected damage on your mobile. If you were able to backup your device, then the only thing you need to do is to access the files. Backup apps usually have a simple interface so you can recover files with no problem. Access Backup Files on Google Drive: This is a free backup service from Google on every android mobile. Here, you can upload and backup data upto 15GB. Here’s how to get to access those files. Access Google Drive via app or browserThe list of uploaded files will be displayed. Scroll down to look for those you need. To make things easier, you may also use the search box and type in the file name or extension.Click on your desired file and hit Download.2. Android Data Recovery Software: This is the another alternative possible way to recover lost files from android devices. No matter even if your phone has become formatted, water damaged, factory reset, broken, etc. You can restore deleted data from more 600 android device. It can help to recover various types of files such as photos, contacts, text messages, videos, documents, notes, WhatsApp chats and media, call history and many more. You can follow below steps to use this tool: Download and install the best Android data recovery tool on PC Connect your android device to PC via USB cableScan your device for few minutes and click on next button After few minutes, it will show the preview of deleted and lost files Select your desired lost files and click on recover button.That’s it. Now you can backup data either on PC or Google Drive. If your data has lost due to any accidental reason then, you can restore it without facing any problem.

Yes, it is possible to recover deleted files from Android internal storage memory if the file was archived or the file is skipped when other files were overwritten then, it can be restored. But if it can overwrite the complete data then, this is beyond the data recovery and it is impossible to recover data. So, data recovery is possible from any storage device except in “overwriting” situation. Part 1: Recover deleted/lost files from Android internal phone memory with Google Drive Backup Google backup is a free tool to recover lost files and folders from phone storage. It can give its users with a cloud server to backup data like photos, videos, Apps, music, audios, documents and many more. If you have upload your files from its cloud then, you can simply recover deleted files Android internal storage memory. Google has been automatically upload and save all your photos on “Google Photos” App if you have marked as “Back up & Sync” option. So, you can always take the backup of all photos on Google Photos app. Part 2: Android Data Recovery Software There have available many Android data recovery tool from different brands on internet. It is a very easy and safe method to recover lost, deleted and formatted data from any situation. You can easily restore any type of file such as images, videos, contacts, WhatsApp, messages, call logs and many more if your phone has been damaged, dead, broken, etc. Follow below steps to recover data from Android device with the help of Android Data Recovery software: Step 1: Download and install Android Data Recovery Software Step 2: After installing this tool on your PC, and choose “Data Recovery” option  Step 3: Connect your Android Mobile phone to PC using a USB cable. Make sure you have enabled USB debugging on your phone. When your phone is detected then, it looks like below picture:  Step 4: Choose your desired lost files to recover them and then, click on “Next” button to continue the data recovery process. It will scan devices for few minutes.  Step 5: When the scan process will complete then, it will show preview of lost files before recover them. So, check the items as you want and click on “Recover” option to save them all on your computer.  That’s it. Now your all lost data has been recover. You can try free trial editions of this utility. If this will show preview of deleted files from Android Internal memory then, you can try full editions to recover files. This is a completely safe method to recover data from android device. Thanks for reading
